name: n_estimators
short_descr: The number of trees in the forest.

name: max_depth
short_descr: The maximum depth of the tree.

name: min_samples_split
short_descr: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

name: min_weight_fraction_leaf
short_descr: The minimum weighted fraction of the sum total of weights (of all the input samples) required to be at a leaf node.
